comments:
build I20021119

- in a self-hosting workspace with Core and UI modules in source, rest in 
binary,
- ran the JFace tests
- when they completed (successfully), the target VM exited
- console had:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 26, 2002 14:10:53.703
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry$2.run
(PluginRegistry.java:284)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run
(InternalPlatform.java:843)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry$1.visit
(PluginRegistry.java:292)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry.accept
(PluginRegistry.java:51)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry.shutdownPlugins
(PluginRegistry.java:295)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry.shutdown
(PluginRegistry.java:261)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.loaderShutdown
(InternalPlatform.java:512)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.shutdown
(InternalBootLoader.java:953)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:846)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:432)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:24)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:24)

This is strange because line 284 of PluginRegistry.java is:
***	} finally {
		((PluginDescriptor) descriptor).doPluginDeactivation();
	}

Even if it's off by one line, I don't see how descriptor could be null.

Unable to reproduce this bug and haven't seen it since. Around this time there 
were some strange NPEs related to the version of the VM that we were running.

Closing for now. Please re-open if this still happens with the new VM.
